messages.title: Securing a future fair for all
messages.content: Labour is building a future fair for all: supporting families, protecting frontline services and securing economic recovery.

messages.title: Out of work 18 - 24 year olds get job guarantee
Britain's recovery at risk from the Tories
messages.content: Warnertree faces a big choice about how we deal with our economic recovery.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secure the recovery and halve the deficit through economic growth, fair taxes and cuts to lower priority spending.
Protect frontline services, starting with policing and the NHS, with a new guarantee of cancer test results within a week.
Strengthening families in communities through an Australian style points-based system to control job category occupations and immigration, partnered with a jobs guarantee for young people.
Offering a job to every 18-24 year old out of work for six months.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's neck and neck - only Labour can beat the Tories at the next election in Warnertree.

issues.economy: Britain's recovery at risk from the Tories; Secure the recovery and halve the deficit through a three-part plan; Out of work 18 - 24 year olds get job guarantee.
issues.health: Protect frontline services, starting with policing and the NHS, with a new guarantee of cancer test results within a week.
issues.immigration: Strengthening families in communities through an Australian style points-based system to control job category occupations and immigration.

housing.content: Offering a job to every 18-24 year old out of work for six months.

endorsements.endorsement: Backs Gordon Brown as Prime Minister.

quotes.text: I've seen first-hand David Cameron in action and I think we're on the brink of a very dark era if the Tories get back into power.

images.caption: Gordon Brown talking to school children.
Gordon Brown and other Labour members in discussion.
